live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41004.summary: area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41004.title: Aug 22 – Thunder Bay (McIntyre) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
